Question 16 
Electrical machine (Single phase induction motor)
A 10 pole, 50 Hz, 240 V, single phase induction motor runs at 540 RPM while driving rated load. The 
frequency of induced rotor currents due to backward field is
(A)  100 Hz 
(B) 95 Hz
(C)  10 Hz 
(D) 5 Hz
